summary: Simple single-page website displaying 'Bytes console winning!' in large text with a code entry input box.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page frontend view that displays the exact text "Bytes console winning!" in very large, prominent letters at the top/center of the page.
Add a code entry UI directly beneath the headline: a labeled input box where the user can enter a code.
Apply a coherent visual theme across the page (colors, typography, spacing, and background) suitable for a minimal “console/bytes” style, and keep it consistent for the headline and code input.
Update the app’s visual color palette to an “electric / technology” theme (neon-tech aesthetic) while keeping the existing layout and the exact headline text and code-entry UI unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple webpage that shows 'Bytes console winning!' in BIG letters and includes an input box to enter a code.
Update the page color scheme to an 'electric' / technology-themed palette (tech-style colors).

projectName: Single-page site with big headline and code entry box
